div.head: To the Papists, or popishly affected.
div.p: I Beseech you by our Christ, performe this Christian duty; whereto my Practice doth invite you, by a Precedent. Read my Treatise; As I doe, and will the learnedst Authors on your side. If your impartiall judgement censure it, as Erron • ous: reject it, refute it. But if my arguments be strong: love not the name of the Church, more than you doe the Truth of the Church. Magna est veritas! Christ grant that his Truth may prevaile on either partie.

closer.signed: Yours in the Truth, IOHN SQVIRE.
